jld.title: Make Sure Your Website Is Ready for This CWV Update
description: Is your website ready for the upcoming Core Web Vitals update? Google has officially announced that as of March 12, 2024, the Interaction to Next Paint (INP) metric will replace First Input Delay (FID) as a Core Web Vital. If you are a Justia website client, you are all set! We closely follow these announcements and update our sites accordingly, but if you do not have a Justia website, we recommend checking with your web provider. Consider exploring Justia Elevate for the best in tech!
